item.title: By: carin13
item.dc:creator: carin13
item.description: i love this. and love that you're writing again (albeit sporadically). i'm planning to gack and give you full credit wherever it ends up (in an email to S proclaiming your brilliance or maybe on my LJ site). :o) love you milt

item.description:
<strong>Homesick Traveler Blues</strong>
My friend Amy has a nice post about the feelings of the homesick traveler....
item.content:encoded:
Homesick Traveler Blues

My friend Amy has a nice post about the feelings of the homesick traveler….

item.title: By: zak
item.dc:creator: zak
item.description:
I will trade you a bit of prose for your lovely poem:
The loved traveler measures their journey by the beat of a heart that is far away. Slow but sure steps carry them outward, while ever-quickening strides usher their return.
item.content:encoded:
I will trade you a bit of prose for your lovely poem:

The loved traveler measures their journey by the beat of a heart that is far away. Slow but sure steps carry them outward, while ever-quickening strides usher their return.
